The table gives the weight <math alttext="y"><mi>y</mi></math>, in pounds, of an animal for selected ages <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>, in years. A logarithmic regression is used to model these data.
content.question: What is the weight of the animal, to the nearest pound, predicted by the logarithmic function model at age <math alttext="4.5"> <mn>4.5</mn> </math> years?

topic.text: 2.14: Logarithmic Function Context and Data Modeling

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
